admin.permittojoin.label: Permit to join
admin.permittojoin.subtitle: Enable/Disable for a period of time the pairing process with Zigate
admin.permittojoin.title: Accept new Hardware
admin.swreset.title: Soft reset
admin.swreset.subtitle: Will restart Zigate (no lost of paired devices)
admin.erasepdm.title: Erase Zigate
admin.erasepdm.subtitle: Will erase the permanent data memory of Zigate (lost of all paired devices)
dashboard.plugin.subtitle: Provides plugin informations
dashboard.stats.subtitle: Provides Zigate statistics in terms of message transmission and reception
dashboard.zigate.subtitle: Provides ZIgate informations as used Channel, used extended PANID, Zigate IEEE and Short Address
device.byname.subtitle: List all HW devices paired with the plugin, and allow you to enter a friendly name for each of them. In addition you get some device informations
group.create.subtitle: Allow edit , create and remove groups, considers that a plugin restart will be required to take the changes into account
network.stats.subtitle: Network subtitle
network.topo.subtitle: Topology subtitle
network.topo.visu.subtitle: Topology visualization subtitle
network.topo.device.visu.subtitle: Devices List subtitle
network.topology.req.subtitle: request scan topo subtitle
network.inter.req.subtitle: request scan inter subtitle
setting.subtitle: Allow you to visualize and edit the various plugin settings. Some might required a restart of the plugin to be taken into account
